entry.dcterms:description: the role of the government in the economic life of the country, opinions about democracy
entry.dcterms:subject: social behaviour and attitudes
psychology
mass political behavior, attitudes
economic conditions and indicators
science and technology
political institutions, public administration
person
survey data
time-series
Sample representative of the adult populations, where the age limit of adults varied from country to country.
Data collection with questionnaire, method varying from country to country.
B

entry.dcterms:subject: Participating countries: Australia (AUS), Bulgaria (BG), Czech Republic (CZ), United States of America (USA), Philippines (RP), Ireland (IRL), Israel, Jews (IL-J), Israel, Arabs (IL-A), Japan (J), Canada (CND), Poland (PL), Lithuania (LV), Hungary (H), Great Britain (GB), Germany (East) (D-E), Germany (West) (D-E), Norway (N), Italy (I), Russia (RUS), Spain (E), Sweden (S), Slovenia (SLO), New Zealand (NZ)
